title: fat_proc_convert_dcm_dwis
description: Convert sets of DWIs in DICOM format into 'nicer' volume+grad format, reorient volumetric data, and glue together multiple sessions/directories of data.

output_nifti.title: Output NIFTI
output_nifti.description: A NIFTI file with N volumes.

output_rvec.title: Output rvec
output_rvec.description: A row-wise (3xN) bvec file of the (unit-magnitude) gradient orientations.

output_bval.title: Output bval
output_bval.description: A row-wise (1xN) bval file of the gradient magnitudes.

output_matA.title: Output matA
output_matA.description: A column-wise (Nx6) AFNI-style matrix file of the (scaled) b-matrix values.

output_matT.title: Output matT
output_matT.description: A column-wise (Nx6) TORTOISE-style matrix file of the (scaled) b-matrix values.

output_cvec.title: Output cvec
output_cvec.description: A column-wise (Nx3) bvec file of the (b-magn scaled) gradient orientations.
